issue.title: Allow Vector3::Equal to use vector of tolerances

content.raw: I don't think it would be useful to have elementwise tolerance because of the difficulty in supplying meaningful values for them. Having a relative tolerance available makes that largely unnecessary since that produces a different absolute tolerance for each element based on its size.
